# Home page | Center of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence

URL: https://ceai.agh.edu.pl/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:19:13

About us

About us

The AGH University of Krakow is a modern university that actively participates in fostering a knowledge-based society and creating innovative technologies. Our university has a well-established position in the country and is recognized abroad. Experienced staff, advanced laboratories, a unique campus, and, above all, the bonds that connect the AGH University community are our greatest assets.

The Center of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence will foster the development of a nationally recognized AI ecosystem centered at AGH University.

Our vision is to create a renowned, state-of-the-art facility equipped to create innovative AI solutions in the most up-to-date areas, including medicine, virtual reality, natural language analysis, autonomous vehicles, and robotics. It will serve the field of AI software and hardware development, mentoring and professional skills acquisition, and job creation. In addition, it will facilitate advancements in ethics and socially responsible policies surrounding AI. As technologies such as AI continue to grow, they will have a great impact on our quality of life.

 At the  Center of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence we conduct advanced projects, organize specialized courses and trainings to which we invite you.

Tab block

Our Partners

CEAI collaborates with a range of leading academic research institutions as well as industry partners in the broad field of AI and ML.

Al Initiative
